00014 #ifndef MC2_POINT
00015 #define MC2_POINT
00016 
00017 #include "config.h"

00019 #ifdef __SYMBIAN32__
00020 #include <e32std.h>

00022 
00027 #ifndef __SYMBIAN32__
00028 class MC2Point {
00029 public:
00030    typedef int32 coord_t;
00032    MC2Point(coord_t inx, coord_t iny) : x(inx), y(iny) {}
00033    
00035    inline const coord_t getX() const { return x; }
00036    
00038    inline const coord_t getY() const { return y; }
00039 
00041    inline coord_t& getX() { return x; }
00043    inline coord_t& getY() { return y; }
00044 
00045    inline bool operator==(const MC2Point& other) const {
00046       return ( getX() == other.getX() ) && ( getY() == other.getY() );
00047    }
00048    
00049    inline bool operator!=(const MC2Point& other) const {
00050       return ( getX() != other.getX() ) || ( getY() != other.getY() );
00051    }
00052 
00053 private:
00055    coord_t x;
00057    coord_t y;
00058 
00059 #else
00060 
00061 class MC2Point : public TPoint {
00062 public:
00063    typedef TInt coord_t;
00065    MC2Point(coord_t inx, coord_t iny) : TPoint(inx, iny) {}
00067    inline const coord_t getX() const { return iX; }
00068    
00070    inline const coord_t getY() const { return iY; }
00071 
00073    inline coord_t& getX() { return iX; }
00075    inline coord_t& getY() { return iY; }
00076    
00077 #endif
00078    // Common code!
00079 public:
00080    inline MC2Point& operator+=(const MC2Point& other ) {
00081       getX() += other.getX();
00082       getY() += other.getY();
00083       return *this;
00084    }
00085 
00086    inline MC2Point& operator-=(const MC2Point& other ) {
00087       getX() -= other.getX();
00088       getY() -= other.getY();
00089       return *this;
00090    }
00091    
00092    inline MC2Point operator+( const MC2Point& other ) const {
00093       return MC2Point(*this) += other;
00094    }
00095    
00096    inline MC2Point operator-( const MC2Point& other ) const {
00097       return MC2Point(*this) -= other;
00098    }
00099  
00101    inline int32 dot( const MC2Point& other ) const {
00102       return getX() * other.getX() + getY() * other.getY();
00103    }
00104    
00106    inline int64 dot64( const MC2Point& other ) const {
00107       return int64( getX() ) * other.getX() + int64( getY() ) * other.getY();
00108    }
00109    
00114    class XYHelper {
00115    public:
00117       coord_t getX( const MC2Point& coord ) const {
00118          return coord.getX();
00119       }
00121       coord_t getY( const MC2Point& coord ) const {
00122          return coord.getY();         
00123       }
00125       coord_t getX( const MC2Point* coord ) const {
00126          return coord->getX();
00127       }
00129       coord_t getY( const MC2Point* coord ) const {
00130          return coord->getY();         
00131       }
00132    };
00133 };
00134 
00135 namespace GfxUtil {
00136 // For MC2Point
00137 inline int32 getCoordX( const MC2Point& point ) {
00138    return point.getX();
00139 }
00140 
00141 inline int32 getCoordY( const MC2Point& point ) {
00142    return point.getY();
00143 }
00144 
00145 template<class POINTLIKE>
00146 MC2Point getPoint( const POINTLIKE& p )
00147 {
00148    return MC2Point( getCoordX(p), getCoordY(p) );
00149 }
00150 
00151 }
00152 
00153 
00154 inline ostream& operator<<( ostream& ost, const MC2Point& point )
00155 {
00156    return ost << "{" << point.getX() << "," << point.getY() << "}";
00157 }
